Name: Immortals(修仙志)
About the game: Update log： v1.01b In this version, We repaired the Bug of resulting in game stop in the fourth tier Boss war. v1.0 《Immortals》 is a SLG with fast paced fighting. When the game starts, the hero will appear in a huge maze, and your goal is to find a way out of the maze. The hero will encounter other characters in the maze. They may be enemies or friends. You need to be careful in making judgments. You need to collect materials, make magic weapons, learn skills and fight in this maze to find a way out of the maze. Game features -You can learn dozens of skills. -You can get a game full of strategies. -There are ten kinds of monsters waiting for you to beat them. -All kinds of roles are your enemies. Each of them has strong skills. You need to be careful. -5 unique levels waiting for you to conquer. -You need to make decisions and learn different skills to create unique combat styles. -The exciting story will go to different ends because of your choice.
